document.full_text: egypt will hold a parliamentary election in september, its military rulers said on monday, setting a date that analysts said would suit well-organized islamists and remnants of former leader hosni mubarak's party.
document.title: egypt plans september ballot, shortens curfew
lines_and_colors: egypt will hold a parliamentary election in september, its military rulers said on monday, setting a date that analysts said would suit well-organized islamists and remnants of former leader hosni mubarak's party.
